projects.title: Newton Classroom
projects.description: A modern, powerful and unified educational management system that helps you run your School more intelligently. Professional work as Backend Engineer serving thousands of students.

projects.title: Checkers AI
projects.description: Mini-max algorithm with alpha-beta pruning based AI bot game developed as part of academics. Features intelligent opponent with optimal game strategy.

projects.title: TCP File Server
projects.description: A file server implementation using Java Socket programming for network-based file transfer operations with multi-client support using TCP/IP protocol.

projects.title: Prim's Algorithm
projects.description: Optimization of Prim's algorithm for finding Minimum Spanning Tree using adjacency list with min-Heap data structure for optimal performance.

projects.title: Copycart
projects.description: E-commerce backend platform for goods exchange with modern GraphQL API, NoSQL database, authentication, and real-time updates for scalable operations.
